TopicTitle: How To Make Your Game Crash

Articles.Content:
I replied to a post a little while ago with this and I figured it might help if we all have a discussion to narrow down the root of the game breaking bugs. Please state your console followed by the full details leading up to your crash/loss of data.

Here's my experience on Xbox One:

Start a game, get multiple vessels in action (as in orbit, landings, and I'm pretty sure the MPLs might be playing a part in this), make sure you've got some debris from spent fuel tanks in orbit (might play a part in this) and then time warp. "Works" for me everytime. The game will crash, you re-open it and you are then reverted to an extremely earlier state.

After that, it will continue to crash and it will always revert to the same state.

Has anyone experienced this issue WITHOUT deploying any MPLs? This might help narrow it down.
